text: Mana nibenjila halala ninaye mumboye (mujela) Abasiani babili, mulala wabu naboola mbu; “ Esie ndilutsi(elorere) nendinyanga amalwa” Ne owundi naboola mbu; “Esie ndilutsi nenjinjile khumurwe kwanje omukate ne amayoni nikabotsa” khuboolele eshimanyisio shiamaloro ako, toto efwe khukhulola mbu oli mubandu abalayi.”
